participant_1.background: i am a swim coach at my local pool. my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited. my family and i are from india. my favorite music genre is death metal. i am studying to be a computer programmer.

participant_2.background: my wife and kids are the best. my favorite ice cream flavor is chocolate. i've three children. i'm a plumber. i love going to the park with my three children and my wife.

content.text: i'm doing good how are you? how about you?
